name: SLEDDING IN NORWAY - Country #1 of 12
description:
The first in a 12 part series, showing you how to travel to some of the world's most exciting destinations at a fraction of the price. I kick off the year in Oslo, Norway.  Follow me across the world visiting 12 countries in 12 months whilst showing you how to do the same. 

For more details on this trip, as well as deals, offers and travel glitches, check out www.TrekTrendy.com
